summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Monday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 13
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly higher on Monday, with 18 gaining and one declining.
Bitcoin rose 15.1% to $24,230 by market close.
